title: Stop exporting _version_ during GROUP BY aggregations in map_reduce mode
description: Currently the SolrTable implementation is exporting version when doing GROUP BY aggregations in map_reduce mode. There is no reason for this and it slows things down. This ticket will stop this from occurring.
